Name: Gravity Ball
About the game: Test your reflexes! Gravity Ball is a game where you aim to make the best score. To do this, avoid obstacles on the path of your ball. You will only need your mouse, just click once so that your ball moves from one wall to another. Each click gives you 1 point. It is an arcade-style game that allows you to relax while watching a video or to entertain yourself while loading another game for example.
